actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to make retrospective accounting and monthly reporting optional with the States under the program of aid to families with dependent children.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to make retrospective accounting and monthly reporting optional with the States. (Currently such accounting and reporting requirements are mandatory.)

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to make retrospective accounting and monthly reporting optional with the States under the program of aid to families with dependent children.
